value.name: Avon burglar killed while stealing a car in Lakewood
value.description: AVON — A man serving time for car theft and burglary walked away from the halfway house and was shot by Lakewood police when he fired at them after allegedly stealing another car. Robin Barber originally landed in jail last year after he admitted he ...
